summary: A young woman is forced by circumstance into a loveless marriage while still in love with another. This episodic tale follows their story through three decades of bitter conflict which engulfs their children and those around them.
cast: Hideko Takamine|Keiji Sada|Tatsuya Nakadai|Nobuko Otowa|Akira Ishihama|Yukiko Fuji|Kiyoshi Nonomura|Yoshi Katô|Yasushi Nagata|Torahiko Hamada|Masakazu Tamura|Masaya Totsuka|Eijirô Tôno
title: Un amor inmortal
